=== Welcome ===

This is the wiki page for the Lithuanian LoCo Team. Our team provide free support in Lithuanian language on using Ubuntu. You can get support on active <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.lt/forum|Ubuntu.lt Forum]]</nowiki> or IRC channel '''#ubuntu''' at <nowiki>[[http://www.aitvaras.eu/serveriai|Aitvaras]]</nowiki> server.

=== Contacts ===

Home page: <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.lt|Ubuntu.lt]]</nowiki>

Mailing list: ubuntu-lt@lists.ubuntu.com

Discusion and support forum: <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.lt/forum|Ubuntu.lt Forum]]</nowiki>

IRC chat room at <nowiki>[[http://www.aitvaras.eu/serveriai|Aitvaras]]</nowiki>: #ubuntu

IRC chat room at freenode.net: #ubuntu-lt

Launchpad Team: https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-lt

==== Translating Ubuntu to Lithuanian language ====

See UbuntuLithuanianTranslators for more details.

==== Ubuntu Book ====

Book about how to use Ubuntu and migrate from Windows. Book is hosted in Wikibooks project. You can visit and write this book by following address:

<nowiki>[[http://lt.wikibooks.org/wiki/Ubuntu_Linux_%C5%BEaliems|„Ubuntu Linux žaliems“]]</nowiki>

Book is written in Lithuanian language.
